original_title: Midget Madness: A Look At The Lighter Side Of Midget Wrestling
overview: Take a hilarious look inside the wacky world of Midget wrestling, with 30 minutes of fun filled bloopers and action packed excitement.  It's all here: the colorful characters, the high flying body slams, last second pins and dirty tricks.  There's even a section on the Midget Wrestling awards!  Footage provided by The American Wrestling Association.
title: Midget Madness: A Look At The Lighter Side Of Midget Wrestling
